title: 'Didn't make a mistake': Trump refuses to apologise for video depicting Obamas as monkeys
summary_full: President Trump refused to apologise for a racist video depicting the Obamas as apes, which he posted and then deleted. He claimed he hadn't seen the offensive content and blamed a staffer, despite acknowledging he watched part of it. The White House initially defended the post before stating a staffer made an error.
